11.title: Final Fantasy

choices: The party runs into a setback
Change up the storyline or Plot?
111.content:
200 Years Ago

It started with four crystals; that of Earth, Fire, Water and Wind which powered the world of Lufenia and held back a dark secret beneath its light gleam. The Lufenians, a race of Elven people, were highly intelligent and used the power of the crystals to energize their technologies such as airships and even cities that floated among the heavens. This would prove to be foolish, however, as the crystals began to fade and lose their shining glow. The airships crashed and the aerial cities fell into ruin as the power ran low. The tragedy was just beginning for the Lufenians though as the crystals could no longer hold back the power from the God of Chaos. The crystals have held this back since ancient times only letting a slither of power from Chaos escape into the world but with the crystals all but drained the full havoc wreaked on the land. The Earth shook with intense ferocity, the waters were always treacherous and consumed any ship that dared cross them, fire was harder to create but when it was created it became uncontrollable and burned anything down as if it was alive, and the winds rarely blew and when they did it was like that of a typhoon or hurricane! The Lufenians devolved, losing the ability to cast magic naturally and began losing their Elven traits, many of them becoming humans or retaining some magic and Elven traits but becoming small and weak. The people of Lufenia lived in sorrow and needed hope. Some even turned to worshipping Chaos in a temple built before even the crystals themselves but most looked to a great Sage who maintained his power, Lukahn, who tells the story of four warriors of light who shall banish the darkness and save the land from peril. This gave the people hope.

200 Years Later....

"So this is Lufenia", says a young knight dressed in a dazzling suit of armor with a helmet that had short horns facing forward. He looked around at the nature amongst him. The lush greenery and blue waters of the sea surrounding the peninsula he stood on seemed beautiful but a darkness filled the air around him like a cloak.
"Seems like you aren't from here either... that must make you one of the so-called Warriors of Light I'm paired with, huh?", says another young man, but instead of a heavy suit of armor, he wears street clothing with small bits of leather armor around his vital areas and a tattered bandanna around his head. His face had many stubbles of unshaven hair and he wreaked of thievery and outlaw but at the same time no evil was detected in him.
"Paired with?", asks the young knight, "Surely you aren't.... One of the warriors of light?"
"Yeah, that's what I said isn't it? Maybe you should take off that ridiculous helmet so you can hear better!", replies the thief.
"Guys, save your quarrel, we have more urgent matters to attend", says an older voice. The knight and their look as a shorter figure enters from behind a tree. He wears a blue cloak that covers his body and a mage hat which also covers his face in darkness, only showing a bright pair of glowing, yellow eyes. He smelt of darkness but no evil seemed to be in this man, in fact quite the opposite despite his appearance.
"Great... More company", says the thief.
"The more the merrier", replies the knight, "In fact Cosmos told me their would be one more..."
"That would be me!", says a young female voice. Out from the tall grass beyond comes a young woman, dressed in a red cloak that had been coat and tailored to be more... provocative than usual mage clothing. A strict balance of dark and light emanated from her body but her intentions seemed to be light-dominate.
"Hell yeah", said the theif said as he walked over to the red mage,"Did it hurt when Cosmos cut your wings because surely you were one of her angels...."
BOOM!!!
The red mage let a spark of fire magic erupt from her hands as the thief was blasted back.

"Come, we have no time for foolishness, destiny is at hand", said the young knight as he pointed to a city beyond the forests. "Let us go there."

As the warriors began to walk the thief looked back at the red mage, "That was hot... just like you babe!"
The red mage looked back at the thief, "Would you like to see how hot I can get", she said with her hands glowing with a bright red flame.
"No.... I'm good", said the thief as he picked up his pace...
111.title: Dawn of the Souls

1111.content:
The warriors of light traveled through the green forests on the way to the kingdom ahead. The trees were thick and tall, blocking much light causing it to be really dark despite it being the prime of daylight, there was no stealth in their travel as the many leaves that covered the forest ground like a carpet had crumbled and cracked loudly as they stepped on them.

"So, my name is Karith", said the thief reluctantly, feeling uneased by the silence of travel.

There was a small moment of silence once again.

"Auburn", the red mage blurted out, "My name is Auburn."

"Now we're getting somewhere!", Karith exclaimed before looking to the black mage "What about you Mr. Moody?"

"My name is of no importance.... but if you must know, call me Pain, the very name of the staff which deals such."

"Bwahahahahahahaha!!!!!!!", a loud menacing laugh is heard in the background before the young warrior has a chance to introduce himself.

"W-what is that?", says Karith, he is immediately answered as four beasts rush from behind a tree at the heroes. They were short and ugly with green skin, long ears, sharp teeth and menacing red eyes.

"Goblins", muttered Pain.

Without warning the beasts attacked with light warriors with their sharp claws. Karith leaped back, dodging his goblin foe's claws. After he landed on the ground, he pulled his dagger out and made a swift counter attack upon the beast, piecing the weak flesh thus making short work of the foe.

Auburn used her magic to form a barrier in front of herself which the goblin foolishly collided into, she then transformed the barrier into a flaming explosion which finished the goblin off.

Pain wasn't so lucky as he dodged the goblin was able to land a claw onto his robe, making a tear. This pissed Pain off with a red fury.

"Foolish beast! Be gone!!!"

Pain casted his strongest fire spell and blasted the beast into oblivion.

Then there was the goblin that was charging to the young knight. He stood there without moving as the goblin lunged in the air and was going to pounce on him, one the goblin got close, the knight unsheathed his shining sword.
"My name is Light and you shall be released from the realm of the living!"

Wshhhhhh!!!!

The goblin in two separate halves and flew by the warrior, he striking so fast that nobody even saw his arm or sword move.

".... Well, that was one hell of an introduction!", said Karith as the party once again began its journey.
1111.title: Introductions

154.title: Final Fantasy VIII

choices: Trabia Garden: Before the events of Final Fantasy VIII
Balamb Garden: At the start of Final Fantasy VIII
Balamb Garden: After Final Fantasy VIII events
1541.content:
"Come on sleepy head. Wake up." I slowly woke up to the voice of my roommate waking me up.


"Alright Selphie, just give me a few more minutes to wake up." I replied.


"We don't have time for a few more minutes John. We've only got 45 minutes to get ready, eat breakfast, and rush up to class. Now hurry up and get ready, or I'm bringing you to class the way you are." My eyes snapped open upon hearing Selphie make that threat. After all, i didn't want to be brought to class in my underwear. Again.


Quickly i got up and threw my school outfit on, followed by me walking over to the small pool near my desk and brushing my teeth. Then i spun around and looked up at Selphie and waited for her to pick me up.


Author note


Yes, i just described myself as looking up at Selphie and waiting for her to pick me up. I would need to do this, since I'm only six inches tall. Oh, and while i have your attention now, at where, and at what timeline do you want me to start off in?
1541.title: Axel's Final Fantasy VIII

choices: Continue the prolog after waking up
Continue the prolog through Selphie's pov
15411.content:
As i spun around, i saw Selphie looking down at me with that same old grin of hers. Then she offered me her right hand as i climbed on and was lifted up to her left shoulder.


"Right. Ready to go John?"


"Ready whenever you are Selphie." And with that, Selphie started rushing out the door and through the halls to the cafeteria.


Prolog



My name is John. And I'm a student at Trabia Garden. My story began when i first came to Trabia. Upon my arrival, i was instructed a guide for my first few days here, until i could remember the layout of the Garden on my own. Her name was Selphie Tilmitt, and she was one of the most hyper-carefree people I've ever seen in my life. Always so happy and positive. It would make some people feel sick, but i kinda enjoyed seeing her like that. It was nice to see someone always filled to the brim with...well, whatever the Hell she was on i guess.


In any case, my first few days were filled with Selphie mostly showing me around the place. It was very cold on the outside, mostly due to the fact that we were so close to the mountains, but on the inside, it was warm and snug. Even in the classrooms and other facility's. The heating in Trabia Garden was top notch. It had to be, otherwise we'd all freeze to death.


After my first few days however, i was instructed to go about on my own. I was doing quite well for a while, until i came across Selphie one day in one of the empty classrooms. She seemed to have her eyes closed and was chanting something while holding a small stone. At first i thought she was saying a pryer of some kind and quietly sat down in one of the empty chairs in front of her, but then i saw her body beginning to glow a golden yellow color, and that's when she shouted the word--


"Shrink!" At that moment, she pointed her finger at the chair i was sitting in, and without any sort of warning, i started feeling like i was going to faint, and then, i blacked out.
15411.title: Trabia Garden: Before the events of Final Fanta...

154111.content:
After a while, i woke up to new surroundings. It took me a while that i was on top of a bed in the infirmary. It also took me a while to realize that i was shrunk down to about six inches tall. When the nurse came to check up on me soon after i calmed down, she informed me that Selphie had brought me in like this, but that the headmaster wanted to talk to her about what she had done to me. It was then i remembered that she was the one who shrank me with that spell of hers.


Soon after the nurse made sure i was alright, i asked to be taken to the headmaster's office to let them know i was alright. When we got there however, i overheard the headmaster talking about removing Selphie from Garden for shrinking a fellow student. So the nurse and i busted into the room, shocking everyone inside, but also confirming with the headmaster that i was indeed alright, even though i was still only six inches tall.


The headmaster however was still not pleased with Selphie, and was still ready to give her her walking papers. But i told the headmaster that i didn't want him to give her the boot, and instead, convinced him to let her stay in Garden in exchange for taking care of me until a cure could be found for the spell. After a moment or two, the headmaster agreed, and Selphie became my personal caregiver, tutor, etc.


Ever since then, Selphie has been doing everything she could caring for me, from buying my clothes, to teaching me how to fend for myself in the event we were ever separated, etc. But enough about the past, lets get back to the present, shall we?
154111.title: Continue the prolog after waking up

15532.content: Okay. You can either follow my story, or you can make your own.
15532.title: Final Fantasy 13

15533.content:
In the world known as Coranlee, there are the six crystal of six elements: fire ruby, water sapphire, wind emerald, solar amber, earth onyx, and thunder topaz. These crystals give the world its power to live as its supposed to be. Worshiping the crystals, the people gained the knowledge of technology to build civilizations (countries named after the crystals found in the region and grow. Eventually the people became obsessed with the knowledge that they had started to engage in a war between the five reigning countries. Now it’s up to the faiths of 7 teenagers to end the war and find the source of the crystal’s knowledge.

What's your role?
15533.title: Make my own Final Fantasy story

155331.content:
Your name is Jonathan Biran DeFerno (John for short) Abandoned as a baby only with a chain-sword (Name of sword: Omi)(evolving weapon) and a ruby-ring, this energetic and cheerful brown haired boy, white skinned, with a white eye and black eye, 17 year old boy always had wondered about his past and goes on an adventure to seek the truth. Resides in Xeno Town. You specialize mainly in Fire magic.

You start you journey with your childhood friend (who has a crush on John), a girl name Lillian Keluke Aqueous (Lily for short). She used to work with her mother as a dancer. This hard-work black haired, green eyed, white skinned, 16 year old girl who works to help Jonathan on his journey with a enchanted dagger that her mother gives her (Name of Dagger: Ama)(evolving weapon) and a sapphire bracelet. She specializes in mainly Water magic.
155331.title: A chain-sword user/Introducing the main characters

1553311.content: The shined in on the island town of Xeno. Jonathan (John) had the sun go right into his eyes, waking him up. "*Yawn* Another day." He said as he got out of bed and got dressed. He then heard a knock on the door. "I wonder who that could be?" When John answered the door he saw that it was. . .
1553311.title: The journey begins

"M-Monster! In the valley!"

John smiled as he strapped his sword to his back. "Leave it to me."
15533112.title: One of the villagers

155331121.content:
As John headed out of the village, he was greeted by his childhood friend and secret crush Lillian.

What did she want?
155331121.title: He goes off

155332.content:
Okay, so you don't like chain-swords. That's fine. Maybe magic is something more to your style? There are lots of types of magic, after all.

There's white, which focuses on healing, or black for offensive spells. Blue is for learning the moves of monsters for your own, and there's red magic, which is kinda like a mixture of some white and black spells. And there's green magic, which is status-changing spells.

But if you don't like rainbow colored magic, then there's also summoning magic, where you can call on the powers of Ethereals, powerful creatures born from the very essence of the six crystals. They only lend their powers to those who they consider as worthy. Each one has a huge statue in certain locations around the world of Coranlee. Ethereals are attributed to certain elements, some are non-elemental, others are instead debuff attributed (e.g. they cause status debuffs upon attacking like poison or silence.) Only six Ethereal statues are well known (right next to where the crystals are), while others are near impossible to find. Each one has two forms; A humanoid form and an animal form.

So, do you use magic or not?
155332.title: Magic?

1553321.content: Caroline Uocene Voltan (Carol for short) (sneaks out of the Topaz Kingdom): a blonde-haired, white skinned, red eyed 15 year old princess of the Topaz Kingdom with a kind and gentle personality wielding scythe-staff (Name of Scythe: Uma)(evolving weapon) and a pair of topaz earrings given to her by her royal guards. Resides in the Topaz Kingdom (Specializes in Lighting and Healing Magic).
1553321.title: Color magic or summoning magic
